treatment_description: Professional cleaning to remove plaque and tartar.Dental cleaning involves the removal of plaque, tartar, and stains from teeth surfaces to improve oral hygiene. This routine procedure helps prevent cavities, gum diseases, and other dental issues. Performed by a dental hygienist, it also includes polishing to restore a smooth tooth surface
